import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from '../CoverTitle/CoverTitle.module.css' export default function HomeCover(props) { return ( <> {Object.keys(props.posts).length === 0 ? null : //

{props.posts.section}
{props.posts.title}
{props.posts.desc}

{props.posts.photographer ? Photographs by {props.posts.photographer}:null}
{props.posts.authorname ? Essay by {props.posts.authorname}:null}

} ) }
